reviewText: The movie is excellent. I am still waiting for the international version to be available.
I purchased this because I couldn't find it on youtube at the time and I am glad I did.  It is fun to watch and I am understanding more of the German language each time I watch it.

I bought this dvd for a close friend who likes heintje.  He has several of Heintje l.p.s.  He was thrilled.  We watched the entire movie in it's non englich language.  We understood very little words.  ALso there was no english subtitles, my friend wished it had.
  We both loved the music.  It was like striking a gold mine, when we heard the good music.  We loved it.  Well worth it.  I made a copy on my computer so he could watch it on his television set.  It would NOT play, otherwise.  I want to purchase all the Heintje dvds for his collection.  He has thousands of movie titles he purchased throughout the years.
